title: Create MetaSignedRequestUtil
description: Create utility in common/utils/ with functions for HMAC-SHA256 signature validation: validateSignedRequest(signedRequest, appSecret), parseSignedRequest(signedRequest), isTimestampValid(timestamp, maxAgeSeconds). Use Node.js crypto module for HMAC-SHA256 following Meta's documentation.
dod: Function parseSignedRequest() extracts payload from signed request
Function isTimestampValid() checks if timestamp is within max age
Uses Node.js crypto module for HMAC-SHA256
Follows Meta's signed request format: base64url(signature).base64url(payload)
Proper error handling for malformed requests
TypeScript types defined for parsed request data
